decisions:
They both are agreed to guide us
during the hackathon and workshop.
We will need sponsor for any additional amount.
Also we'll need a banner for the college gate and few standees for the auditorium.

Before we wrap up our next meeting, we'll be on Friday 4pm in the seminar room to review
progress.

actions.raw: We will need sponsor for any additional amount.
actions.task: We will need sponsor for any additional amount.

actions.raw:
The workshop will
need another 5,000 for materials and certificates.
actions.task:
The workshop will
need another 5,000 for materials and certificates.

actions.raw:
If you give them
branding space and a short slot I will send them the event proposal by tomorrow.
actions.task:
If you give them
branding space and a short slot I will send them the event proposal by tomorrow.

actions.raw: Also Nikita, I will share the event schedule once it's ready.
actions.task: Also Nikita, I will share the event schedule once it's ready.

actions.raw:
I will also start preparing the budget sheet with event wise expenses
and expected income from us.
actions.task:
I will also start preparing the budget sheet with event wise expenses
and expected income from us.

actions.raw: And I will finalize the event rules and judges list by this weekend.
actions.task: And I will finalize the event rules and judges list by this weekend.
